review: I was skeptical about whether Fire TV would be a good choice for me but after using it for about a month, I really like it. I subscribe to Netflix and Hulu so for the first time, I can watch them on my tv. I cancelled my cable tv service several months ago so I'm saving lots of money! I don't watch a lot of other fire tv channels so far but will be exploring more over time. I like being able to use YouTube and Spotify also. Overall, it's one of my favorite devices I've bought recently. I'd recommend.
author: organic

review: We finally ditched our cable company and Amazon Fire is exactly what we needed. There are so many great shows and movies to chose from and the set-up is easy. We literally connected the box to the tv, plugged in the power cord and within a few minutes we were happily watching a movie.Pros: Affordable, great selection, fast!Cons: If I could make one suggestion, it would be to allow an internet search.
